text: @realDonaldTrump Been waiting for you to drain YOUR swamp for some time. Some are in prison, others indicted and some pardoned. You  have a long way to go to rid the White House of criminals. Maybe the disinfectant you tout as getting rid of Covid19 will clean the house of swamp creatures.
